value:
$WmMPID_リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Normal,Face|What a foul spiral... This must be the
entrance to the Tempest.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|That it is. And inside, countless
Heroes will stand in our way.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|So we just gotta take 'em all out,
right? No use standing around.
Let's get to it!$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|Before we go rushing in... Marth, is
there anything else we should know
about what awaits us within?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|There's an incredibly powerful Hero
waiting in the depths of the Tempest...$k$pWhen he fights, his axe and his body
become as one. He is known as a
Berserker.$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|A Berserker...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|Now that'll be an interesting fight. But
no matter who gets in our way, I'll cut
them down. No doubt.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|If anyone else made such a claim, I
might accuse them of arrogance. But
you, Hector... I believe fully.$k$pNow let's move out. We must restore
this world.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest is weakening. Your world
is saved.$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|Marth, I must ask... That Berserker we
fought...$k$pWas that Hector?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|Ha! Now that's a jape if I ever heard
one. How could we have fought me?
I was right by your side!$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Normal,Face|Even so, it's hard to believe
otherwise. His sheer strength, even
his very appearance...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|Hey, what's with all the gloomy looks
suddenly? We won, and I feel better
than ever. Don't worry about it.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|It's as Hector says. That was not the
man you all know. There's no need to
worry.$k$pNow let's go make sure our efforts
have had the desired effect on your
world.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|You all go ahead. I want to talk with
Marth about something.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|You wish to speak with me?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|You say you've seen the future... So
does that mean you've seen mine as
well? You know what happens next?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I do...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|My axe is named Armads... It once
belonged to a Berserker. I remember
something he once said...$k$p"You desire strength? Then
prepare yourself. Once you have
gained such power...$k$pYour life will not end in a
comfortable bed.$k$pYou will die on the battlefield.
In the savage garden of war's
bloody delights."$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Berserker we fought here
received his power by entering into a
contract with Armads. And then—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|I know the story. It's the same as
mine. So I guess that means it really
is my destiny to die on the battlefield...$k$pDon't tell Eliwood and the others, all
right? They don't need to worry
themselves over this.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes, Hector... I promise.$k$pYou are a true Hero. I am honored to
have met you.$k$p
